name: SelectingGameMode
comment: To select game mode in title screen, like Continue, New Game, Multiplayer, Load Game, Configs, Credits, etc.

name: SelectingNewGameVersion
comment: To select which version of game; part of New Game flow.

name: SelectingNewGameSettings
comment: To select new game settings, like difficulty, map size, player and NPC settings, etc.; part of New Game flow.

name: CreatingNewGame
comment: To create a new game with selected settings; part of New Game flow.

name: SelectingMapGeneratorSettings
comment: To select map generator settings, like land/water ratio, map style, seed, etc.; part of New Game flow.

name: SelectingSavedGameToLoad
comment: To select which save game slot to load; part of Load Game flow.

name: LoadingSavedGame
comment: To load the selected save game; part of Load Game flow.

name: ConfigMultiplayerSettings
comment: To configure multiplayer settings, like server address, port, player name, etc.; part of New Game or Load Game flow.

name: ShowingCampaignBriefing
comment: To show campaign briefing before starting a new campaign stage.

name: PlayingVideo
comment: To play intro or outro video.

name: ShowingConfigs
comment: To show and modify game configurations.
